name: SKULLCRUSHER
description:
A game made by Joseph Beck and Eddy Elguezabal

Made for Godot Wild Jam #44

If the wrecking ball spawns on the edges of your screen restart the game to fix. This bug is exclusive to the browser version.

Executable (Windows):

https://www.mediafire.com/file/2iol6ss9cd5jmf9/SKULLCRUSHER.zip/file

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Switch rotation

E - Interact

F - Fullscreen

ESC - Close menu

Credit (Environment Assets):

https://deakcor.itch.io/zelda-like-tileset-dungeon-castle
